name: Elypse (itch)
description:
Every ten years, a sacrifice must be made to protect your people from the Abyss, a mysterious and insatiable force, as worshiped as it is feared… This time YOU were chosen… Nobody has ever returned but perhaps you can achieve the impossible ?Elypse is a 2D metroidvania combining platforming and action that takes place in the depths of an infernal world. Dexterity and perseverance will be needed if you are to explore and escape the Abyss unscathed.

FEATURES

  • A 2D action platformer with a Dark and Gloomy style.
  • A light and handy character. Stand up to traps and dangers with agility!
  • Traverse the abyss with the intuitive dash system.
  • Overcome the horrors that lie ahead with a powerful slash system.
  • Take advantage of a variety of unlockable skills ans abilities in order to survive the gruelling trials of Elypse.
  • Explore striking environments, oozing with atmosphere.

CREDITS

Developped by: Pierre-Louis Verguin

Designed by:Erwan Cochon - Laure Gilli - Timothée Bruneau

Graphics by: Colin Marrassé - Erwan Elysée - Victor Mauduy

Marketing Art by: Paul Meyer - Paul Hardouin--Ayrinhac

Musics/Sound design by:Maxime Engel - William Dupis

Produced & Marketed by: Maxime Chaize - Grégory Le Bris - Augustin Leitao

If you're fan of fascinating and challenging metroidvanias with dark narratives, this game is for you!

**This game is a work in progress, a longer demo will be available on Steam and Itch.io in December 2020**
